job.title: Design Specialist
job.description: <p>▪ Drive sales &amp; achieve sales goals per hour, by connecting customers to you and Pottery Barn Kids </p><p>▪ Inspire associates &amp; customers by connecting them to design trends, inspiration &amp; local resources that reflect the eclectic, creative &amp; modern spirit of the brand </p><p>▪ Develop &amp; manage relationships with clients, designers, developers, local businesses &amp; artisans</p><p>▪ Prioritize the customer &amp; collaborate with your team to ensure adequate selling floor coverage during in-store or in-home appointments</p><p>▪ Discover each customers’ style by sparking conversation, sharing inspiration &amp; consulting with them to learn how to bring their story to life</p><p>▪ Share decorating expertise &amp; develop thoughtful space plans that fit the customers’ lifestyle</p><p>▪ Develop vision boards, floorplans &amp; utilize Pinterest to help customers express their personal style at home</p>
